text.text: Investiture metalminds store your ferring power, temporarily removing it. Tapping will grant access to the stored power. Like identity, anyone can use investiture metalminds regardless of their power. Only your ferring power can be stored (no power from other sources).

On its own, investiture metalminds are not that useful. But combining with identity allows sharing your power with another player, while unkeyed investiture metalminds are used to create unsealed metalminds.
